f7137.value: The Company is the legal successor of Ariston Thermo Holding S.p.A., incorporated as a joint-stock company (società per azioni) under the laws of Italy on 21 July 1986 as Merloni Invest S.p.A. In June 2021, a reverse merger took place whereby Ariston Thermo Holding S.p.A. disappeared into Ariston Thermo International as the surviving entity. Subsequently, Ariston Thermo International was renamed Ariston Thermo Holding S.p.A. After this restructuring, the company was redomiciled to the Netherlands, converted into a Dutch public company with limited liability (naamloze vennootschap) and renamed Ariston Thermo Holding N.V. The redomiciliation became effective on 15 June 2021, upon registration of the Company in the Dutch trade register. When this section refers to the Company, it solely refers to the current Ariston Holding N.V.

f10792.value: production and distribution of hot water and space heating and service solu- tions
